mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS id, i.title AS title, i.price AS price, i.is_sold AS is_sold, i.created_at AS created_at, u.id AS user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, u.profile_image AS profile_image, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item_details WHERE item_id = i.id AND detail_type = 'like') AS `like_count`, d.image_url AS image_url, CASE WHEN il.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_like FROM items i JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id, image_url FROM item_details WHERE detail_type = 'image' LIMIT 1) d ON i.id = d.item_id LEFT JOIN item_details il ON i.id = il.item_id AND il.user_id = #{myId} AND il.detail_type = 'like' WHERE CASE WHEN #{userId} = 0 THEN TRUE ELSE i.user_id = #{userId} END ORDER BY i.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
